Text: This is a great collection indeed! Just want to ad, It's all compressed with Lame 3.92 VBR. All tags and everything are really nice and tidy. Thanks ripper "RootSTeaM", and uploader for this!

Yea, and albums included are..

Babylone by bus
Burnin'
Catch a fire
Confrontation
Exodus
Kaya
Live
Natty Dread
Rastaman Vibration
Rebel music
Survival
Talkin'blues
Uprising

For more info about album check out www.allmusic.com
nice collection indeed... too bad it is taking me forever to download :(
